title: How to add music to iTunes - Quora

response.answer_text: It's seems of difficulty at first U had to follow all these simple steps   Open iTunes.Mac: Go to File > Add to Library. Windows: File > Add Folder to Library. Learn how to turn on iTunes menus in Windows 8 and 7.Navigate to and select the file or folder you want to add.Click Open. Accepted file types You can import these file types into iTunes: AACMP3AIFFApple LosslessWAVaudible.com (.aa)MPEG-4iTunes for Windows can also convert unprotected WMA content to another format for use with iTunes.I guess this wil helpWritten just now. 1 view.

You can either purchase a monthly Subscription of Apple Music for Rs120/mo which will be available on all of your Apple Devices and you can download as well as stream on all the devices. In case if you do not wish to spend on Subscription and add the songs from your PC Library to iPhone or iPod you would need to download the iTunes PC Version, once it is downloaded you can go to Files > Add folder to Library and select your Music Folder from PC, after that connect your Apple Device and sync it including music and Bingo all the files are on your Apple Device.
